Kitronik_Robotics_Board: Blocks for driving the Kitronik All-in-one Robotics Board
Kitronik_Robotics_Board.allOff: Turns off all motors and servos.
Kitronik_Robotics_Board.motorOn:
Sets the requested motor running in chosen direction at a set speed.
if the PCA has not yet been initialised calls the initialisation routine.
Kitronik_Robotics_Board.motorOn|param|sp: how fast to spin the motor
Kitronik_Robotics_Board.servoWrite:
Sets the requested servo to the reguested angle.
If the PCA has not yet been initialised calls the initialisation routine.
Kitronik_Robotics_Board.servoWrite|param: the angle to set the servo to
Kitronik_Robotics_Board.setStepperMotorS:
Set the number of steps per full rotation for a stepper motor
motorSteps is defaulted to 200
which stepper motor to turn on
number of steps for a full rotation, eg: 200
Kitronik_Robotics_Board.stepperMotorTurn:
Sets the requested stepper motor to a chosen angle relative to the start position.
if the PCA has not yet been initialised calls the initialisation routine.
how far to turn the motor relative to start
which stepper motor to turn on

Sets the requested stepper motor to turn a set number of steps.
if the PCA has not yet been initialised calls the initialisation routine.
which stepper motor to turn on
how many steps to turn the motor
